meanings.definition: Make a succession of slight, soft crackling sounds.
meanings.sent1: The leaves were runkling under my feet as I walked through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I heard the fire runkling in the fireplace on a cold winter night.
meanings.sent3: The popcorn runkling in the microwave made me crave a movie night.
meanings.sent4: The campfire runkling in the dark woods created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The runkling of the autumn leaves was a soothing lullaby.

meanings.definition: A series of slight, soft crackling sounds.
meanings.sent1: The runkling of the firewood added to the peaceful ambiance of the cabin.
meanings.sent2: The runkling of the leaves in the wind signaled the arrival of fall.
meanings.sent3: The runkling of the cereal in the bowl was a morning ritual.
meanings.sent4: The runkling of the campfire was music to our ears during the camping trip.
meanings.sent5: The runkling of the bonfire filled the night air with warmth and comfort.
